text: kya tu ne un logo ko nahi dekha, jinhe kaana phosi se rok diya gaya tha, wo phir bhi us roke hoye kaam ko dobara karte hai aur aapas mein gunaah ki aur zulm wa zyaadati ki aur na farmaaniye paighambar ki sargoshiyaa karte hai aur jab tere paas aate hai to, tujhe un lafzo mein salaam karte hai, jin lafzo mein Allah ta’ala ne nahi kaha, aur apne dil mein kehte hai ke Allah ta’ala hamein us par jo hum kehte hai saza kyo nahi deta, un ke liye jahannam kaafi (saza) hai jis mein ye jayenge, so wo bura thikaana hai
